Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 131st/Evans
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Ellis and 131st due to street blockage near 131st/Evans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Ellis and 131st due to street blockage near 131st/Evans.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Western.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
